*ECOSS Tools* is a part of impletation work done during the [ECOSS Interreg Italy-Croatia project](https://www.italy-croatia.eu/) WP5 - title.

Tools allows to:

1. Evaluate the sites, both LTER and N2K, contribution to the Marine Strategy Framework Directive (MSFD) monitoring activity (Directive contribution)

2. Evaluate the N2K sites contribute to the conservation of target species and habitats included in the site (Conservation strategy)
